42664.name: Total food waste (Europa (2010))
42664.description: Total food waste, in tonnes, aggregated across the supply chain.
42664.datasetName: Food waste in the European Union - Europa (2010)
42664.s_name: Food waste in the European Union - Europa (2010)

source.name: Food waste in the European Union - Europa (2010)
source.dataPublishedBy: European Commission (2010). Preparatory study on food waste across EU27
source.additionalInfo:
Data is measured as total food waste per year, measured in mass terms (tonnes per year).

Food waste is disaggregated by wastage from manufacturing, households and 'other' categories. 'Other' is inclusive of all other sectors where food waste occurs, including agricultural production, distribution, retail and catering.
